title: Hope: Suiso Shakai to, Korekara no Energy no Hanashi
original_name: HOPE ～水素社会と、これからのエネルギーのはなし～
sinopse: A Toyota commissioned commercial explaining their hydrogen line of new cars (Toyota Mirai) while also gently explaining the purpose/reason why hydrogen technology is important for the future of the planet and how it helps reduce environmental issues.
